file_content.text: Sadoll? Koru Tama asked me to bring you these.
Oh? Well then, let's have a look. Hand 'em over, come on.
Hah! A fine piece... and this one, such unusual details... and what could these symbols refer to....
Excellent finds! If the Voss find them half as interesting as I do, you'll have done us a big favor--thank you.
I'm always happy to help the cause.
Well, we need all the help we can get.
What have you learned about these people?
The Voss? I'm really only looking into their history... not much to find, though.
It looks to me like the Voss left everything behind when they moved up on top of that mountain. Like they were starting over.
I don't know. Hopefully they'll join up with the Republic, and we'll get the whole story. But I'd better not keep you--stay safe out there.
Don't expect me to go looking for any more junk.
This was a waste of my time.
Suit yourself--but you've got a good eye for the stuff.
Koru Tama told me you might help. Thank you!
Such an interesting people, these Voss.
